title: Travels in Canada: river deep, mountain high
text: If you’re a first-time visitor to western Canada and want to combine all the sights with the freedom to make your own discoveries, the 13-day Passage through the Rockies tour from the Travelmarvel by APT collection is perfect – and excellent value. Memorable experiences include an Ice Explorer ride on Athabasca Glacier, a Blue River wildlife safari, a sightseeing tour of Vancouver and a special dinner at Victoria’s lovely Butchart Gardens. A wildlife safari in what is known to locals as “Grizzly Bear Valley” is followed by a relaxing stay in a log cabin amid mountainscapes Flights, accommodation and tipping are included and there’s free time to explore at leisure. After flying from London to Calgary you’ll enjoy a visit to Yamnuska Wolfdog Sanctuary before spending two nights in Banff with a full day at leisure in the heart of the Rockies. Easy on the eye: Butchart Gardens Visit two of Canada’s most sublime glacial lakes, Moraine and Louise, then take the stunning Icefields Parkway via Athabasca Glacier to spend the night in Jasper National Park. A wildlife safari in what is known to locals as “Grizzly Bear Valley” is followed by a relaxing stay in a log cabin amid mountainscapes at Mike Wiegele Heli Village, before crossing the rugged ranchlands of the Cariboo region to Vancouver. Alternatively, you can exchange your Blue River experience and mountain cabin for a two-day train journey in a SilverLeaf carriage on the Rocky Mountaineer from Jasper to Vancouver (at extra cost). A matter of taste: enjoy the fabulous food of Vancouver You’ll have a day free to explore Vancouver, before a coach trip along the Sea to Sky Highway to Whistler. Finally you’ll spend two nights in Victoria, with a farewell dinner at beautiful Butchart Gardens. You could also extend your holiday by adding a thrilling seven-night Alaska cruise adventure in an inside cabin. What’s included • Passage Through the Rockies Premium Tour costs from £2,895pp, twin share, including an early booking saving of up to £200 per couple when booked by 31 October, 2015. Price includes flights, all guided excursions, many meals, premium accommodation, all tipping, transfers, porterage and taxes. Departures from April to September 2016. • For more information or to book, call 0800 046 7729 or visit aptouring.co.uk »
